title: OTT Subscription Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform for selling OTT subscription gift cards. Includes user authentication, payment integration, admin dashboard, and product management.

title: Oil & Gas Software Solutions
description: A dynamic brand website for an oil and gas software solutions company. Features include dynamic job postings, company details, and a responsive design.

title: P2P Payment Gateway
description: A peer-to-peer payment gateway that allows users to complete transactions automatically by entering their transaction ID. Integrates with bKash and Nagad personal accounts for seamless payment processing.
